**Scratchpad:**

* Main sections:
	+ Parties
	+ Provisions
	+ Clauses
* Note: Each party has a name, general partner, and signature-executed-by section.
* Complex relationships: The `provision` and `clause` elements have text content, while the `party` element has multiple child elements.

**Reconstruction Process:**

1. **Parties:** Identify the parties involved in the contract by extracting their names, general partners, and signatures from the XML document.

Contract Text:

This Agreement is made as of [Date] between the following parties:

* Nustar Energy L.P., a limited partnership (the "Partnership");
* Riverwalk Logistics, L.P. (the "Parent");
* Energy Transfer LP (the "ET"); and
* Sunoco LP (the "Sunoco").

Each party is referred to herein as a "Party" or collectively as the "Parties".

2. **Provisions:** Extract the text content from the `provision` elements, considering any conditional attributes.

Contract Text:

PROVISIONS

The remainder of this page is intentionally left blank.

IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the Partnership, Parent and ET have executed this Agreement as of the date first written above.

3. **Clauses:** Extract the title and text content from the `clause` elements, considering any conditional attributes.

Contract Text:

CLAUSES

**Waiver of Jury Trial**

Each of the parties hereto acknowledges and agrees that any controversy which may arise under this Agreement is likely to involve complicated and difficult issues, and therefore each such party irrevocably and unconditionally waives, to the fullest extent permitted by applicable Law, any and all right to trial by jury in any action or proceeding arising out of or relating to this Agreement or the transactions contemplated hereby.

**Severability**

[Any term or provision of this Agreement which is held to be invalid or unenforceable in a court of competent jurisdiction shall be ineffective to the extent of such invalidity or unenforceability without rendering invalid or unenforceable the remaining terms and provisions of this Agreement.]

**Counterparts**

This Agreement may be executed in two (2) or more counterparts, each of which shall be an original, with the same effect as if the signatures thereto and hereto were upon the same instrument, and shall become effective when one or more counterparts have been signed by each of the parties and delivered (by telecopy, electronic delivery or otherwise) to the other parties.

**Final Reconstructed Contract Text:**

CONTRACT FOR [DATE]

PARTIES

This Agreement is made as of [Date] between the following parties:

* Nustar Energy L.P., a limited partnership (the "Partnership");
* Riverwalk Logistics, L.P. (the "Parent");
* Energy Transfer LP (the "ET"); and
* Sunoco LP (the "Sunoco").

Each party is referred to herein as a "Party" or collectively as the "Parties".

PROVISIONS

The remainder of this page is intentionally left blank.

IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the Partnership, Parent and ET have executed this Agreement as of the date first written above.

CLAUSES

**Waiver of Jury Trial**

Each of the parties hereto acknowledges and agrees that any controversy which may arise under this Agreement is likely to involve complicated and difficult issues, and therefore each such party irrevocably and unconditionally waives, to the fullest extent permitted by applicable Law, any and all right to trial by jury in any action or proceeding arising out of or relating to this Agreement or the transactions contemplated hereby.

**Severability**

[Any term or provision of this Agreement which is held to be invalid or unenforceable in a court of competent jurisdiction shall be ineffective to the extent of such invalidity or unenforceability without rendering invalid or unenforceable the remaining terms and provisions of this Agreement.]

**Counterparts**

This Agreement may be executed in two (2) or more counterparts, each of which shall be an original, with the same effect as if the signatures thereto and hereto were upon the same instrument, and shall become effective when one or more counterparts have been signed by each of the parties and delivered (by telecopy, electronic delivery or otherwise) to the other parties.

IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the Parties have executed this Agreement as of the date first written above.

Signed,

[Nustar Energy L.P.]
RIVERWALK LOGISTICS, L.P.
ENERGY TRANSFER LP
SUNOCO LP

By: _______________________________________
Date: _______________________________________

Signature: _______________________________________

Note: The reconstructed contract text is presented without signatures and dates for clarity purposes.
